contentrichtext.text: This is a list of [[List of U.S. state prisons|state prisons]] in [[Nevada]] operated by the [[Nevada Department of Corrections]]. It does not include [[List of U.S. federal prisons|federal prisons]] or county jails located in the state of Nevada. ==Institutions== * [[Ely State Prison]] - Nevada's death row * [[High Desert State Prison (Nevada)|High Desert State Prison]] * [[Lovelock Correctional Center]] * [[Nevada State Prison]] * [[Northern Nevada Correctional Center and Stewart Conservation Camp]] * [[Northern Nevada Restitution Center]] * [[Southern Desert Correctional Center]] * [[Southern Nevada Correctional Center]] * [[Florence McClure Women's Correctional Center]] (previously Southern Nevada Women's Correctional Facility) * [[Warm Springs Correctional Center]] * [[Three Lakes Valley Boot Camp]] == External links == *[http://www.doc.nv.gov/ Nevada Department of Corrections] ==References== <div class="references-small" style="clear:both;"> <references/> </div> {{Incarceration in the United States}} {{Nevada}} [[Category:Prisons in Nevada| ]] [[Category:Lists of United States state prisons|Nevada]] [[Category:Nevada-related lists|Prisons]]
